title: Made to Love You
description: After putting the most terrifying night of her life behind her, Jaylinn McCormick is moving on. That is, until unexpected and life-altering events send her spiraling in an unknown direction. Cooper Cahill has finally found a balance in his life. He’s got Jaylinn back, his business with his friend Eli is thriving, and his baseball career is grand-slamming down a new path. But all it takes is one phone call to destroy it all.Can Cooper help Jaylinn dodge this curve ball life has pitched in her direction? Will the love they’ve found in each other be enough?
author: Megan   Smith
